ARABIC: فِى قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ فَزَادَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ مَرَضًا وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌۢ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَكْذِبُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: There is a sickness in their hearts and Allah has increased their sickness. They will have a painful punishment on account of their denial.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Sick are their hearts, and God adds to their malady. For them is suffering for they lie.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: In their hearts is a disease which Allah has increased all the more and a painful doom is in store for them for the lie they utter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: A sickness exists in their hearts to which God adds more sickness. Besides this, they will suffer a painful punishment as a result of the lie which they speak.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: In their hearts is a disease, so Allah has increased their disease; and for them is a painful punishment, because of their lies.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: In their hearts is a disease and Allah has increased their disease. A painful torment is theirs because they used to tell lies.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: There is a disease in their hearts, so Allah added to their disease and they shall have a painful chastisement because they lied.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: In their hearts is a sickness, and God has increased their sickness, and there awaits them a painful chastisement for that they have cried lies.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: In their hearts is a disease, and Allah increaseth their disease. A painful doom is theirs because they lie.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: In their hearts is a disease, which God has increased. They will have a painful punishment, because they have been lying.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: In their hearts is a disease, so Allah hath increased unto them that disease; and unto them shall be a torment afflictive, for they have been lying.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: There is a sickness in their hearts; then Allah increased their sickness, and there is a painful punishment for them because of the lies they used to tell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: In their hearts is a disease; and Allah has increased their disease: And grievous is the penalty they (incur), because they are false (to themselves).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: In their hearts is a disease (of doubt and hypocrisy) and Allah has increased their disease. A painful torment is theirs because they used to tell lies.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: There is a sickness in their hearts which Allah has increased. For them there is a painful punishment because they lie.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: In their hearts is sickness, and God has increased their sickness. They will have a painful punishment because of their denial.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: In their hearts is disease, so Allah has increased their disease; and for them is a painful punishment because they [habitually] used to lie.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [2:10] In their hearts is a sickness: doubt and hypocrisy, which ails their hearts, debilitating them; and God has increased their sickness with what He has revealed in the Qur’ān, since they disbelieve it; and there awaits them a painful chastisement because they used to lie (read yukadhdhibūn to imply [that they used to call] the Prophet of God [a liar], or yakdhibūn to imply their [mendacity when] saying ‘we believe’).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (In their hearts is a disease), doubt, hypocrisy, conflict and darkness (so Allah increaseth their disease), increased their doubt, hypocrisy, conflict and darkness. (And a painful doom is theirs), they will have a painful torment in the Hereafter which shall extend to their hearts, (because they lie) in secret, the reference here being to the hypocrites: 'Abdullah ibn Ubayy, Jadd Ibn Qays and Mu'attib Ibn Qushayr.
